overview:
Sumit is an Industry veteran with more than 20 years of experience at Silicon Valley’s flagship companies such as Apple and Sun Microsystems. Sumit brings a pro-active and hands-on executive experience in delivering high availability hosted software for Fortune 500 companies, which is paramount to providing carrier-class mobile solutions.

Prior to InTooch, Sumit has served as Chief Technology Officer and/or VPE of several public and private companies, including Selectica (NasdaqGM: SLTC), Determine Software (acquired by Selectica) and NetProspect (acquired by FreeLotto). He also held senior engineering positions at Sun Microsystems and Apple Computer.

Sumit holds a Master of Science from the university of Rochester and a Bachelor degree in Electronics from the Indian Institute of Technology in Kharagpur.
